definition: The amplifier section defines elements that can be used to describe amplifier properties and settings.

description.definition: A description of this hardware item.

duty_cycle.definition: The amplifier duty cylce if in disconinuous mode (e.g. 0.25, 0.5).

highpass_cutoff.definition: The cutoff frequency of the amplifier's highpass filter.

inventory_no.definition: The inventory number of the device.

lowpass_cutoff.definition: The cutoff frequency of the amplifier's lowpass filter.

manufacturer.definition: The Manufacturer of this hardware item.

measurement_type.definition: The amplifier mode. Measurement in Voltage clamp controlled current clamp -mode.

model.definition: The model name of this hardware item.

owner.definition: Who's the owner of the device.

switching_frequency.definition: The amplifier switching frequency. This property is only meaningful in Discontinuos operation modes.

type.definition: The type of amplifier. E.g. extracellular, intracellular amplifier etc.
